english_phrase: You can find him under the tree.
explanation_en: This is the word for under (this is a preposition)

english_phrase: First he left, then he came back.
He was angry. Not surprising, though.
russian_phrase: Он был зол. Впрочем, не удивительно.
explanation_en: Means however / though / anyway. A transition word.

english_phrase: Although he was tired, he kept working.
russian_phrase: Хотя он устал, он продолжал роботать.
explanation_en: Means although, even / though – used for contrast.

english_phrase: He ended up in Moscow without any money.
russian_phrase: Он оказался в Москве без денег.
explanation_en: Means – to turn out / to end up / to find oneself
